articles.title: India abstains in UN Human Rights Council vote on Russia-Ukraine crisis - India Today
articles.description: India has abstained in a vote in UN Human Rights Council, on a draft resolution against Russia's invasion of Ukraine. UNHRC has decided to urgently establish an independent international commission of inquiry.
